at0000.1.description: وثيقة لتوصيل المعلومات للآخرين, عادة كاستجابة لطلب من طرف آخر.

at0005.1.description: حالة التقرير بشكل كلي. و لا تمثل هذه الحالة جزءا من التقرير و إنما جميعه ككل.

at0000.1.description: *Document to communicate information to others, commonly in response to a request from another party.(en)

at0005.1.description: *The status of the entire report. Note: This is not the status of any of the report components.(en)

at0000.1.description: Document to communicate information to others, commonly in response to a request from another party.

at0005.1.description: The status of the entire report. Note: This is not the status of any of the report components.

at0000.1.description: Documento para comunicar información a otros, comunmente en respuesta a la solicitud de un tercero.

at0002.1.description: Información para la identificación del informe.

at0005.1.description: El estado del informe como un todo. Nota: no se refiere al estado de alguno de los componentes del informe.

at0000.1.description: A general clinical activity carried out for the patient to receive a specified service, advice or care from an expert healthcare provider.

at0011.1.description: Identification of the clinical service to be/being carried out.
at0011.1.comment: Coding of the specific service name with a terminology is preferred, where possible.

at0014.1.description: Type of service to be carried out or being carried out.

at0013.1.description: Narrative description about the service, as appropriate for the pathway step.

at0021.1.description: The sequence of the specified clinical service.
at0021.1.comment: Only for use in association with the 'Service delivered' pathway step. For example: record that this is the 3rd physiotherapy appointment in a planned sequence.

at0000.1.description: Structured information about the timing (intended or actual) of administration or use of a medicine, other therapeutic good or other intervention that is given on a scheduled basis.

at0003.1.description: The frequency as number of times per time period (limited to a single day) that the activity is to take place.
at0003.1.comment: e.g. "4 times per day" or ""3 to 4 times per hour"

at0014.1.description: The time interval or minimum and maximum range of an interval between each scheduled activity, limited to a single day.

at0004.1.description: A specific time or interval of time  during a single day when the activity should occur.

at0026.1.description: A specific, named time event within a single day, when the activity should occur.
at0026.1.comment:
e.g. before each meal, at bedtime, in the morning.
It is understood that these terms may not equate to the same exact times in different cultures.

at0023.1.description: Is exact timing of the activity critical to patient safety or wellbeing?

at0024.1.description: The activity should only occur when the "as required" trigger condition is met.

at0025.1.description: The condition which triggers an 'as required' activity.

at0000.1.description: *Structured information about the timing (intended or actual) of administration or use of a medicine, other therapeutic good or other intervention that is given on a scheduled basis.(en)

at0003.1.description: *The frequency as number of times per time period (limited to a single day) that the activity is to take place.(en)
at0003.1.comment: *e.g. "4 times per day" or ""3 to 4 times per hour"(en)

at0014.1.description: *The time interval between each scheduled activity, limited to a single day.(en)

at0004.1.description: *A specific time during a single day when the activity should occur.(en)

at0026.1.description: *A specific, named time event within a single day, when the activity should occur.(en)
at0026.1.comment:
*e.g. before each meal, at bedtime, in the morning.
It is understood that these terms may not equate to the same exact times in different cultures.(en)

at0023.1.description: *Is exact timing of the activity critical to patient safety or wellbeing?(en)

at0024.1.description: *The activity should only occur when the "as required" trigger condition is met.(en)

at0025.1.description: *The condition which triggers an 'as required' activity.(en)

at0000.1.description: قياس وزن الجسم للشخص

at0024.1.description: تعليق حول قياس الوزن

at0009.1.description: وصف حالة الملبس الذي يرتديه الشخص في وقت قياس الوزن.

at0025.1.description: لتسجيل أي قضايا أو عوامل قد تؤثر في قياس وزن الجسم, مثل الوقت من الدورة الشهرية, آخر مرة لإفراغ الأمعاء أو ملاحظة وجود بتر في أحد الأعضاء

at0000.1.description: Измерение актуальной массы тела человека.

at0024.1.description: Комментарии к взвешиванию.

at0009.1.description: Описание наличия и характера одежды пациента во время взвешивания.

at0025.1.description: Фиксация любых фактов, могущих повлиять на результат взвешивания: фаза менструального цикла, давность опорожнения кишечника, сведения об ампутации и др.

at0000.1.description: 個人の体重を測定したもの

at0024.1.description: 体重測定の際のコメント

at0009.1.description: 体重を測定したときの着衣の状態についての記述

at0025.1.description: 体重測定に関与しうるすべての問題や因子を記録する。たとえば、月経周期や、最近の排便状態、あるいは四肢切断についての記録など。

at0000.1.description: اندازه گیری وزن بدن فرد

at0024.1.description: نظر در مورد اندازه گیری وزن

at0009.1.description: توصیف میزان لباس فرد در زمان اندازه گیری وزن

at0025.1.description: ثبت هر گونه مساله یا فاکتوری که ممکن است روی اندازه گیری وزن در زمان اندازه گیری تاثیر داشته باشه به عنوان مثال در زمان عادت ماهیانه ،دفع مدفوع، یا ثبت قطع عضو

at0000.1.description: 个人体重（身体重量）的测量。

at0024.1.description: 关于体重（身体重量）测量的备注。

at0009.1.description: 关于称重时受检人员的衣着状态。

at0025.1.description: 用于记录任何可能对体重测量造成影响的问题或因素，如月经周期所处时间阶段、最近排便的时间安排情况或者截肢情况说明。

at0000.1.description: A medição do peso corporal de um indivíduo.

at0024.1.description: Comentário sobre a medição do peso.

at0009.1.description: Descrição do vestuário da pessoa na hora da pesagem.

at0025.1.description: Registrar quaisquer problemas ou fatores que possam ter impacto sobre a medição de peso corporal, por exemplo, no momento do ciclo menstrual, o ciclo intestinal ou anotando amputação.

at0000.1.description: Measurement of the body weight of an individual.

at0024.1.description: Comment about the measurement of weight.

at0009.1.description: Description of the state of dress of the person at the time of weighing.

at0025.1.description: Record any issues or factors that may impact on the measurement of body weight eg timing in menstrual cycle, timing of recent bowel motion or noting of amputation.

at0000.1.description: Messung des Körpergewichts eines Individuums.

at0024.1.description: Kommentar über die Messung des Gewichts.

at0009.1.description: Beschreibung der Bekleidung zum Zeitpunkt der Messung.

at0025.1.description: Zur Dokumentation von Faktoren, die einen Einfluss auf die Messung des Körpergewichts haben können, z.B. Zeitpunkt in der Menstruationsperiode, Zeitpunkt des letzten Stuhlgangs, durchgeführte Amputationen.

at0000.1.description: Meting van het lichaamsgewicht van een individu.

at0024.1.description: Opmerking over de gewichts meting.

at0009.1.description: Beschrijving van de hoeveelheid kleding van de persoon, op het moment van wegen.

at0025.1.description: Registreer eventuele problemen of factoren die van invloed kunnen zijn op de meting van het lichaamsgewicht bijvoorbeeld timing in de menstruele cyclus, timing van de recente stoelgang of het noteren van een amputatie.

at0000.1.description: Medición del peso corporal de un individuo.

at0024.1.description: Observaciones acerca de la medición del peso.

at0009.1.description: Descripción de la indumentaria del sujeto en el momento de la medición.

at0025.1.description: Registrar cualquier consideración que pueda influir en la medida del peso ej: amputaciones, momento del ciclo menstrual, etc. (en)

at0000.1.description: *An instrument, apparatus, implant, material or similar, used in the provision of healthcare. In this context, a medical device includes a broad range of devices which act through a variety of physical, mechanical, thermal or similar means but specifically excludes devices which act through medicinal means such as pharmacological, metabolic or immunological methods.  The scope is inclusive of disposable devices as well as durable or persisting devices that require tracking, maintenance activities or regular calibration, recognising that each type of device has specific data recording requirements.(en)

at0025.1.description: *Identification of the version of software being used in the medical device.(en)
at0025.1.comment: *When the medical device is an actual software application, record the version of the software using this data element. When the medical device has multiple software applications embedded within it, record each software component in a separate CLUSTER archetype within the Components SLOT - either as a nested instance of another CLUSTER.device archetype or using a CLUSTER archetype designed specifically for recording software details (but not yet available at time of this archetype development).(en)

at0007.1.description: التاريخ الذي يكون عنجه الجهيزة/المنتج غير مناسبا للاستخدام

at0024.1.description: *Unspecified identifier, which can be further specified in a template or at run time.(en)
at0024.1.comment: *Coding of the name of the identifier with a coding system is desirable, if available.(en)

at0000.1.description: An instrument, apparatus, implant, material or similar, used in the provision of healthcare. In this context, a medical device includes a broad range of devices which act through a variety of physical, mechanical, thermal or similar means but specifically excludes devices which act through medicinal means such as pharmacological, metabolic or immunological methods.  The scope is inclusive of disposable devices as well as durable or persisting devices that require tracking, maintenance activities or regular calibration, recognising that each type of device has specific data recording requirements.

at0002.1.description: Narrative description of the medical device.

at0020.1.description: Number assigned by the manufacturer which can be found on the device, and should be specific to each device., its label, or accompanying packaging.

at0022.1.description: The exact number assigned by the manufacturer, as it appears in the manufacturer's catalogue, device labeling, or accompanying packaging.

at0023.1.description: The exact model number assigned by the manufacturer and found on the device label or accompanying packaging.

at0006.1.description: The number assigned by the manufacturer which identifies a group of items manufactured at the same time, usually found on the label or packaging material.

at0025.1.description: Identification of the version of software being used in the medical device.
at0025.1.comment: When the medical device is an actual software application, record the version of the software using this data element. When the medical device has multiple software applications embedded within it, record each software component in a separate CLUSTER archetype within the Components SLOT - either as a nested instance of another CLUSTER.device archetype or using a CLUSTER archetype designed specifically for recording software details (but not yet available at time of this archetype development).

at0007.1.description: Date after which the device/product is no longer fit for use, usually found on the device itself or printed on the accompanying packaging.
at0007.1.comment: This date usually applies only to single use or disposable devices.

at0024.1.description: Unspecified identifier, which can be further specified in a template or at run time.
at0024.1.comment: Coding of the name of the identifier with a coding system is desirable, if available.

at0000.1.description: *An instrument, apparatus, implant, material or similar, used in the provision of healthcare. In this context, a medical device includes a broad range of devices which act through a variety of physical, mechanical, thermal or similar means but specifically excludes devices which act through medicinal means such as pharmacological, metabolic or immunological methods.  The scope is inclusive of disposable devices as well as durable or persisting devices that require tracking, maintenance activities or regular calibration, recognising that each type of device has specific data recording requirements.(en)

at0006.1.description: *The number assigned by the manufacturer which identifies a group of items manufactured at the same time, usually found on the label or packaging material.(en)

at0025.1.description: *Identification of the version of software being used in the medical device.(en)
at0025.1.comment: *When the medical device is an actual software application, record the version of the software using this data element. at0007.1.description: *Date after which the device/product is no longer fit for use, usually found on the device itself or printed on the accompanying packaging.(en)
at0007.1.comment: *This date usually applies only to single use or disposable devices.(en)

at0024.1.description: *Unspecified identifier, which can be further specified in a template or at run time.(en)
at0024.1.comment: *Coding of the name of the identifier with a coding system is desirable, if available.(en)

The scope is inclusive of disposable devices as well as durable or persisting devices that require tracking, maintenance activities or regular calibration, recognising that each type of device has specific data recording requirements.(en)

at0007.1.description: Fecha para la cual el dispositivo o producto deja de ser adecuado para su uso.

at0024.1.description: *Unspecified identifier, which can be further specified in a template or at run time.(en)
at0024.1.comment: *Coding of the name of the identifier with a coding system is desirable, if available.(en)

author.name: Alan March
author.organisation: Hospital Universitario Austral, Buenos Aires, Argentina

at0000.1.description: *An instrument, apparatus, implant, material or similar, used in the provision of healthcare. In this context, a medical device includes a broad range of devices which act through a variety of physical, mechanical, thermal or similar means but specifically excludes devices which act through medicinal means such as pharmacological, metabolic or immunological methods.  The scope is inclusive of disposable devices as well as durable or persisting devices that require tracking, maintenance activities or regular calibration, recognising that each type of device has specific data recording requirements.(en)

at0003.1.comment:
*Not applicable if a category is already recorded in 'Device Name'.
Coding with a terminology is desirable, where possible, This may include use of GTIN or EAN numbers.(en)

The scope is inclusive of disposable devices as well as durable or persisting devices that require tracking, maintenance activities or regular calibration, recognising that each type of device has specific data recording requirements.

at0003.1.description: The category or kind of device.
at0003.1.comment:
Not applicable if a category is already recorded in 'Device name'.
 Example: if the 'Device' is named as a 'urinary catheter'; the 'Type' may be recorded as 'indwelling' or 'condom'.Coding with a terminology is desirable, where possible. This may include use of GTIN or EAN numbers.
